column1: Philadelphia 76ers forward Jerami Grant has been fined $10,000 for throwing a water bottle into the spectator stands, it was announced today by Kiki VanDeWeghe, Executive Vice President, Basketball Operations.
The incident occurred with 8:44 remaining in the fourth quarter of the Sixers' 116-108 loss to the Washington Wizards on Feb. 29 at Verizon Center.
